alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Washington; Southeast Aroostook; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 3:16PM EST until February 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THURSDAY TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches expected. * WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Eastern, North Woods and Penobscot Valley Maine. * WHEN...From 1 PM Thursday to 7 PM EST Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will severely impact travel. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
